title: Utilization of extremely precise analytics: A State-of-the-Art Approach and Future Potentials
abstract: Critical decisions are now taken with the assistance or relying exclusively on the analysis of massive amounts of complex, volatile, diverse, inconsistent, partially erroneous data, requiring extensive pre/post processing for curation and harmonization, often challenged by privacy considerations and resource/technology limitations. Although many commercial and open-source frameworks were deployed to tackle these challenges, new techniques need to be developed to optimize the prediction accuracy and robustness of artificial intelligence/machine learning and simulation models and validate them in constrained settings. In this paper, progress beyond the state-of-the-art is discussed in the context of extremely precise predictions, simulations, human-centered personalized user interactions, trustworthy artificial intelligence and automated decision-making. The idea of AI-empowered user models that encapsulate parameters such as domain expertise and experience is also presented under the blueprints presentation of a platform that will provide human-centered adaptive data visualizations, facilitating data exploration and enabling effective decision-making.
